input: <web-search>Find current information about: landing page strategy gallery pricing table responsive design patterns 2026</web-search>
output:
Based on the current research, here are the key landing page strategies, gallery patterns, pricing tables, and responsive design trends for 2026:

## **Landing Page Strategy**

**Mobile-First Approach**: Landing pages are now designed with mobile devices as the priority—fast loading, adaptive layouts, thumb-friendly buttons, and minimalist content, then scaled up for larger screens.

**Minimalist, Focused Layouts**: The trend is toward clean designs that eliminate distractions, using generous whitespace, simple or no navigation, and a single prominent call-to-action (CTA).

**Product-Led Storytelling**: Landing pages serve as revenue assets that influence customer acquisition cost (CAC) and pipeline quality, with focused layouts and buyer-aligned messaging that provides clarity without requiring heavy sales involvement.

## **Gallery & Visual Design Patterns**

**Interactive Screenshots**: Static screenshots are evolving into interactive components, with leading examples featuring embedded product previews, video demos, and guided tours directly in the hero section.

**Bold Typography**: Oversized, expressive fonts paired with concise, high-impact headlines and tight, scannable supporting copy to accommodate shorter attention spans.

**Minimal, Meaningful Motion**: CTA button hover effects, scrolling content reveals, animated form feedback, and animated feature icons—animation that adds meaning rather than distraction.

## **Pricing Table Design**

Pricing pages remain the most visited (and often most overlooked) pages, with analysis showing the need for clear blueprints with insights, wireframes, and checklists. While specific 2026 patterns weren't detailed in the search results, the emphasis is on clarity and conversion optimization.

## **Responsive Design Patterns**

**Adaptive Layouts**: Designs that seamlessly adjust to any screen size with responsive web design principles.

**Drag-and-Drop Builders**: Tools offering customizable, conversion-optimized responsive templates that maintain engagement across devices.

**Speed Optimization**: Fast-loading pages are critical for 2026, with performance considered a core design element.

**AI-Powered Personalization**: Using AI to tailor content and experiences to individual visitors, improving conversion rates.

Sources:
- [20 Landing Page Examples That Actually Convert in 2026](https://www.superside.com/blog/landing-page-design-examples)
- [Landing Page Design Trends by Industry (2026 Guide) | involve.me](https://www.involve.me/blog/landing-page-design-trends)
- [9 Landing Page Trends For 2026](https://www.involve.me/blog/landing-page-trends)
- [10 SaaS Landing Page Trends for 2026 (with Real Examples) - SaaSFrame Blog](https://www.saasframe.io/blog/10-saas-landing-page-trends-for-2026-with-real-examples)
- [Top Landing Page Design Trends for B2B SaaS in 2026 - SaaS Hero](https://www.saashero.net/content/top-landing-page-design-trends/)
- [The 7 Best Landing Page Builders For 2026](https://www.searchenginejournal.com/the-7-best-landing-page-builders-for-2026/561935/)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: document image augmentation OCR text similarity 2024</web-search>
output:
Based on my search, here are the key developments in document image augmentation for OCR and text similarity from 2024:

## Recent Research Highlights

**Generative Data Augmentation for Engineering Documents**
A December 2024 study leveraged ScrabbleGAN, a generative deep learning model, to create synthetic training images that replicate original document fonts. This addresses data scarcity issues and significantly improved OCR model performance, particularly for KerasOCR models.

**OCR2SEQ Multi-Modal Augmentation**
The OCR2SEQ approach introduces innovative multi-modal generative augmentation strategies that simulate realistic text extraction errors. This is especially valuable for handling sparse character sets and specialized vocabularies, substantially improving training efficacy for sequence-to-sequence text transformers.

**TextImage Augmentation Techniques**
Modern approaches combine text-level augmentation (random insertion, deletion, swap) with image manipulation. The process blacks out text regions and inpaints them using bounding box size as a font size proxy, creating datasets with semantically similar content and visually distorted images.

**Text Similarity for OCR Evaluation**
Researchers are using Sentence-BERT (SBERT) frameworks with multilingual paraphrase models like MiniLM-L12-v2 to compute cosine similarity scores between OCR outputs and ground-truth texts, providing more nuanced accuracy measurements than simple character error rates.

**Specialized Scene Text Augmentation**
Tools like STRAug offer 36 specialized augmentation functions organized into 8 groups specifically designed for Scene Text Recognition tasks.

The 2024 research trend shows a strong focus on transformer-based models, generative augmentation techniques, and multi-modal approaches that better simulate real-world OCR challenges.

Sources:
- [Leveraging Transformer-Based OCR Model with Generative Data Augmentation for Engineering Document Recognition](https://www.mdpi.com/2079-9292/14/1/5)
- [Introducing TextImage Augmentation for Document Images](https://huggingface.co/blog/doc_aug_hf_alb)
- [Advancing machine learning with OCR2SEQ: an innovative approach to multi-modal data augmentation](https://journalofbigdata.springeropen.com/articles/10.1186/s40537-024-00927-4)
- [Effective Data Augmentation for OCR | Towards Data Science](https://towardsdatascience.com/effective-data-augmentation-for-ocr-8013080aa9fa/)
- [GitHub - mindee/doctr](https://github.com/mindee/doctr)
- [GitHub - roatienza/straug](https://github.com/roatienza/straug)
- [Printed document layout analysis and optical character recognition system based on deep learning](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-025-07439-y)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: 한국 정부사이트 PDF 다운로드 curl SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL 해결 2026</web-search>
output:
Based on the search results, here's information about resolving the `SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL` error when downloading PDFs from Korean government websites using curl:

## SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL 에러 해결 방법

### 주요 원인
- **OpenSSL 3.2 이상 버전 호환성 문제**: 구형 서버가 SSL 연결을 제대로 종료하지 않을 때 (no "close notify") 발생합니다. 이는 한국 정부 사이트와 같은 구형 서버에서 특히 자주 발생합니다.
- **인증서 검증 실패**: curl이 신뢰할 수 없는 인증 기관의 인증서를 만났을 때 발생합니다.

### 해결 방법

1. **SSL 검증 우회 (테스트용)**:
   ```bash
   curl -k https://example.go.kr/file.pdf -o output.pdf
   # 또는
   curl --insecure https://example.go.kr/file.pdf -o output.pdf
   ```

2. **CA 인증서 추가** (권장):
   ```bash
   curl --cacert /path/to/ca-bundle.crt https://example.go.kr/file.pdf -o output.pdf
   ```

3. **TLS/SSL 버전 지정**:
   ```bash
   curl --tlsv1.2 https://example.go.kr/file.pdf -o output.pdf
   # 또는
   curl --tls-max 1.2 https://example.go.kr/file.pdf -o output.pdf
   ```

4. **OpenSSL 버전 다운그레이드**: OpenSSL 3.2 이전 버전을 사용하거나, curl을 이전 OpenSSL 버전과 함께 빌드된 것으로 사용

5. **방화벽/포트 설정 확인**: 인증 기관 URL과 PORT가 방화벽에서 차단되지 않았는지 확인

### 디버깅
문제를 자세히 확인하려면:
```bash
curl -v https://example.go.kr/file.pdf -o output.pdf
```

Sources:
- ["OpenSSL SSL_read: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL" with OpenSSL ≥ 3.2 + old servers · Issue #17471 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/17471)
- [SSL 보안서버 인증서 오류 및 장애 해결방안](https://help.ucert.co.kr/42355d89-68ba-41d4-ba98-b9a2b2e15688)
- [OpenSSL SSL_connect: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL in connection · Issue #14154 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/14154)
- [curl 에 신뢰하는 인증기관 인증서(CA Cert) 추가하기](https://www.lesstif.com/gitbook/curl-ca-cert-15892500.html)
- [[리눅스] curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate](https://velog.io/@hyojinnnnnan/%EB%A6%AC%EB%88%85%EC%8A%A4-curl-60-SSL-certificate-problem-unable-to-get-local-issuer-certificate)

input: <web-search>How do I find information about: pendlay row deficit tutorial youtube 2026?</web-search>
output:
Based on my search, I found several resources about deficit Pendlay rows, though specific YouTube tutorials from 2026 weren't directly listed. Here's what I found:

## What is a Deficit Pendlay Row?

A deficit Pendlay row involves standing on an elevated platform (like an aerobic stepper or stacked weight plates) while performing the traditional Pendlay row. This increases the range of motion by allowing the barbell to travel lower, achieving a deeper stretch in the back muscles.

## How to Perform It

1. Stand on an elevated platform with a barbell on the floor in front of you
2. Keep your torso parallel to the floor
3. Maintain a braced core throughout the movement
4. Initiate the row by retracting your shoulder blades
5. Drive your elbows toward the ceiling to pull the barbell to your upper abs
6. Pause briefly at the top (fully shortened position)
7. Lower the weight back to the floor with control

## Benefits

- Increases range of motion for greater muscle stimulation
- Builds back thickness and width
- Develops raw pulling strength
- Increases time under tension for muscle growth

For video tutorials, I'd recommend searching directly on YouTube with terms like "deficit Pendlay row tutorial" or "Pendlay row form guide" to find the most current instructional videos.

## Sources:
- [How to Do the Pendlay Row for Back Size and Stronger Lifts | BarBend](https://barbend.com/pendlay-row/)
- [Deficit Pendlay Rows Guide: How To, Benefits, Programming, Variations](https://fitnessvolt.com/deficit-pendlay-rows-guide/)
- [How to do the Pendlay Row: Form, Muscles Worked, Pro Tips](https://backmusclesolutions.com/blogs/the-ql-blawg/pendlay-row)
- [Pendlay Row: How-to, Benefits, Variations, Mistakes & More](https://www.hevyapp.com/exercises/pendlay-row/)
- [Good Idea or Bad? Deficit Pendlay Row - T NATION](https://t-nation.com/t/good-idea-or-bad-deficit-pendlay-row/242657)
- [Deficit Pendlay Row TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@ryanrosenthalfitness/video/7465891413687881003)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: CFTC commitments of traders current week report 2025 download txt file</web-search>
output:
Based on the search results, I can help you find the current CFTC Commitments of Traders report for 2025 in text format.

## Key Information:

The CFTC publishes new COT reports **every Friday at 3:30 PM Eastern Time**, reflecting trader commitments from the prior Tuesday. Here's how to download the TXT files:

### Download Options:

1. **Official CFTC Portal** - The main page where all reports are published:
   - Visit: https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/index.htm
   - Reports are available in text format for download

2. **Public Reporting Environment** (Launched October 2022) - For customizable downloads:
   - Access at: https://publicreporting.cftc.gov/stories/s/r4w3-av2u
   - Allows you to customize, search, filter, and download report data

3. **Direct Archive Access** - For specific exchanges/categories:
   - Example: https://www.cftc.gov/sites/default/files/files/dea/cotarchives/2025/options/
   - Each exchange (CBOT, CME, etc.) has its own download section

### Report Types Available:
- Legacy Reports (data back to January 15, 1986)
- Disaggregated Reports (data back to June 13, 2006)
- Traders in Financial Futures reports (data back to June 13, 2006)

The reports are released weekly, so the most current report for 2025 will be the one from the most recent Friday.

## Sources:
- [Commitments of Traders | CFTC](https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/index.htm)
- [Commitments of Traders | The Commodities Futures Trading Commission](https://publicreporting.cftc.gov/stories/s/Commitments-of-Traders/r4w3-av2u/)
- [CFTC Commitments of Traders Report - CBOT (Combined)](https://www.cftc.gov/sites/default/files/files/dea/cotarchives/2025/options/deacbtsof102125.htm)
- [CFTC Commitments of Traders | Office of Financial Research](https://www.financialresearch.gov/hedge-fund-monitor/datasets/tff/)
- [Commitment of Traders – CME Group](https://www.cmegroup.com/tools-information/quikstrike/commitment-of-traders.html)
- [Commitments of Traders (COT) Charts - Barchart.com](https://www.barchart.com/futures/commitment-of-traders)
- [COT Report - Commitment of Traders | Free CFTC Data & Analysis Tools](https://cot-reports.com/)
